verses.verse: וַיָּב֤וֹא <WH935> vai-ya-Vo Then came אֵלַי֙ <WH413> 'e-Lai about אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH582> 'a-na-Shim, certain מִזִּקְנֵ֖י <WH2205> miz-zik-Nei of the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וַיֵּשְׁב֖וּ <WH3427> vai-ye-she-Vu unto me and sat לְפָנָֽי׃ <WH6440> le-fa-Nai. before פ Peh

בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- Son אָדָ֗ם <WH120> 'a-Dam, of man הָאֲנָשִׁ֤ים <WH376> ha-'a-na-Shim men הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> ha-'El-leh these הֶעֱל֤וּ <WH5927> he-'e-Lu have set up גִלּֽוּלֵיהֶם֙ <WH1544> gil-lu-lei-Hem their idols עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- in לִבָּ֔ם <WH3820> lib-Bam, in their heart וּמִכְשׁ֣וֹל <WH4383> u-mich-Shol the stumblingblock עֲוֹנָ֔ם <WH5771> 'a-vo-Nam, of their iniquity נָתְנ֖וּ <WH5414> na-te-Nu and put נֹ֣כַח <WH5227> No-chach before פְּנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6440> pe-nei-Hem; their face הַאִדָּרֹ֥שׁ <WH1875> ha-'id-da-Rosh should I be enquired אִדָּרֵ֖שׁ <WH1875> 'id-da-Resh of at all לָהֶֽם׃ <WH99999> la-Hem. ס sa-Mek

לָכֵ֣ן <WH3651> la-Chen Therefore דַּבֵּר־ <WH1696> dab-ber- Therefore speak א֠וֹתָם <WH853> o-tom וְאָמַרְתָּ֨ <WH559> ve-'a-mar-Ta unto them and say אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Hem to כֹּה־ <WH3541> koh- Thus אָמַ֣ר׀ <WH559> 'a-Mar unto them Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <WH3069> Yah-weh GOD אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish Every man אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish man מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> mib-Beit of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֡ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> 'a-Sher who יַעֲלֶ֨ה <WH5927> ya-'a-Leh that setteth up אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- גִּלּוּלָ֜יו <WH1544> gil-lu-Lav his idols אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- in לִבּ֗וֹ <WH3820> lib-Bo, in his heart וּמִכְשׁ֤וֹל <WH4383> u-mich-Shol the stumblingblock עֲוֹנוֹ֙ <WH5771> a-vo-No of his iniquity יָשִׂים֙ <WH7760> ya-Sim and putteth נֹ֣כַח <WH5227> No-chach before פָּנָ֔יו <WH6440> pa-Nav, his face וּבָ֖א <WH935> u-Va and cometh אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַנָּבִ֑יא <WH5030> han-na-Vi; to the prophet אֲנִ֣י <WH589> 'a-Ni I יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh I the LORD נַעֲנֵ֧יתִי <WH6030> na-'a-Nei-ti will answer ל֦וֹ <WH99999> lo ; בָהּ vah כבָ֖א <WH99999> Va קבְּרֹ֥ב <WH7230> be-Ro according to the multitude גִּלּוּלָֽיו׃ <WH1544> gil-lu-Lav. of his idols

לְמַ֛עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an order תְּפֹ֥שׂ <WH8610> te-Fos That I may take אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בֵּֽית־ <WH1004> beit- the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel בְּלִבָּ֑ם <WH3820> be-lib-Bam; in their own heart אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who נָזֹ֙רוּ֙ <WH2114> na-Zo-ru because they are all estranged מֵֽעָלַ֔י <WH5921> me-'a-Lai, and בְּגִלּֽוּלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH1544> be-gil-lu-lei-Hem from me through their idols כֻּלָּֽם׃ <WH3605> kul-Lam. all ס sa-Mek

כִּי֩ <WH3588> ki For אִ֨ישׁ <WH376> 'ish For every one אִ֜ישׁ <WH376> 'ish anyone מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> mib-Beit of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וּמֵהַגֵּר֮ <WH1616> u-me-hag-Ger or of the stranger אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- who יָג֣וּר <WH1481> ya-Gur that sojourneth בְּיִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <WH3478> be-Yis-ra-'El in Israel וְיִנָּזֵ֣ר <WH5144> ve-yin-na-Zer which separateth מֵֽאַחֲרַ֗י <WH310> me-'a-cha-Rai, himself from me וְיַ֤עַל <WH5927> ve-Ya-'al and setteth up גִּלּוּלָיו֙ <WH1544> gil-lu-Lav his idols אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- in לִבּ֔וֹ <WH3820> lib-Bo, in his heart וּמִכְשׁ֣וֹל <WH4383> u-mich-Shol the stumblingblock עֲוֹנ֔וֹ <WH5771> a-vo-No, of his iniquity יָשִׂ֖ים <WH7760> ya-Sim and putteth נֹ֣כַח <WH5227> No-chach before פָּנָ֑יו <WH6440> pa-Nav; his face וּבָ֤א <WH935> u-Va and cometh אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַנָּבִיא֙ <WH5030> han-na-Vi to a prophet לִדְרָשׁ־ <WH1875> lid-rosh- to enquire ל֣וֹ <WH99999> lo בִ֔י <WH99999> Vi, אֲנִ֣י <WH589> 'a-Ni I יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, of him concerning me I the LORD נַֽעֲנֶה־ <WH6030> na-'a-neh- will answer לּ֖וֹ <WH99999> lo בִּֽי׃ <WH99999> Bi.

וְנָתַתִּ֨י <WH5414> ve-na-tat-Ti And I will set פָנַ֜י <WH6440> fa-Nai my face בָּאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> ba-'Ish against that man הַה֗וּא <WH1931> ha-Hu, he וַהֲשִֽׂמֹתִ֙יהוּ֙ <WH8074> va-ha-si-mo-Ti-hu and will make לְא֣וֹת <WH226> le-'ot him a sign וְלִמְשָׁלִ֔ים <WH4912> ve-lim-sha-Lim, and a proverb וְהִכְרַתִּ֖יו <WH3772> ve-hich-rat-Tiv and I will cut him off מִתּ֣וֹךְ <WH8432> mit-Toch from the midst עַמִּ֑י <WH5971> 'am-Mi; of my people וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH3045> vi-da'-Tem and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. that I [am] the LORD ס sa-Mek

Israel
